{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}

-- | Minimal implementations of relmaps

module Koshucode.Baala.Minimal.Relmap.Implement
( -- * Operators
  minimalRelmaps
  -- * Operand parser
, relmaps
, relmapParsers
  -- * Relmap constructor
, relmapRename
, relmapSource
  -- * Utilities
, relmapHead
, relmapSign
) where
import Data.Monoid
import Koshucode.Baala.Base.Data
import Koshucode.Baala.Base.Struct
import Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude.Abort
import Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude
import Koshucode.Baala.Minimal.Relmap.Confl
import Koshucode.Baala.Minimal.Relmap.Unary
import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Kit as Kit
import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Syntax as Syn



-- ----------------------  Operators

-- | Minimal implementations of relmaps
minimalRelmaps :: (Ord v) => [RelmapImplement v]
minimalRelmaps = relmaps relmapParsers
    -- Relmap operators in alphabetical order
    [ ("| -"         , makeConcat , ["RELMAP | RELMAP"])
    , ("cut /P"      , makeCut    , ["cut /NAME ..."])
    , ("join R"      , makeJoin   , ["join RELMAP ...",
                                     "join RELMAP ... -share /NAME ..."])
    , ("meet R"      , makeMeet   , ["meet RELMAP ...",
                                     "meet RELMAP ... -share /NAME ..."])
    , ("pick /P"     , makePick   , ["pick /NAME ..."])
    , ("reldee -"    , makeReldee , ["reldee"])
    , ("reldum -"    , makeReldum , ["reldum"])
    , ("rename /N/P" , makeRename , ["rename /NEW /OLD ..."])
    , ("source SRC"  , makeSource , ["source SIGN /NAME ..."])
    ]

makeConcat :: RelmapFullCons v
makeConcat ms _ = Right $ mconcat ms

makeReldee, makeReldum :: RelmapFullCons v
makeReldee = makeRelcon "reldee" reldee
makeReldum = makeRelcon "reldee" reldum

makeRelcon :: String -> Rel v -> RelmapFullCons v
makeRelcon op r _ h = Right $ RelmapConst h op r

makeCut :: (Ord v) => RelmapFullCons v
makeCut _ h = do
  let opd = halfOperand h
  term <- opd <!!> "term"
  ns   <- Syn.termNames term
  Right $ Kit.calc h "cut" (project Kit.drop ns) []

makeJoin :: (Ord v) => RelmapFullCons v
makeJoin ms h = do
  m <- relmapHead ms
  Right $ join h m

makeMeet :: (Ord v) => RelmapFullCons v
makeMeet ms h = do
  m <- relmapHead ms
  Right $ meet h m

makePick :: (Ord v) => RelmapFullCons v
makePick _ h = do
  let opd = halfOperand h
  term <- opd <!!> "term"
  ns   <- Syn.termNames term
  Right $ Kit.calc h "pick" (project Kit.take ns) []

makeRename :: RelmapFullCons v
makeRename _ h = do
  let opd = halfOperand h
  term <- opd <!!> "term"
  np   <- Syn.termNamePairs term
  Right $ relmapRename h np

makeSource :: RelmapFullCons v
makeSource _ h = do
  let opd = halfOperand h
  sign <- relmapSign opd
  term <- opd <!!> "term"
  ns   <- Syn.termNames term
  Right $ relmapSource h sign ns



-- ---------------------- Operand parser

relmaps
  :: [(String, RelmapParser)] -- ^ Set of parser
  -> [(String, RelmapFullCons v, [String])] -- ^ Operator implementations
  -> [RelmapImplement v] -- ^ Result
relmaps parsers = map f where
    f (spec, full, usage) =
        let [operator, pattern] = words spec
            Just parser = lookup pattern parsers
        in RelmapImplement operator parser full usage

-- | Set of operand parsers.
relmapParsers :: [(String, RelmapParser)]
relmapParsers =
    [ ("-"     , terms)
    , ("/N/P"  , terms)
    , ("/P"    , terms)
    , ("R"     , rels)
    , ("SRC"   , src)
    ] where

    terms :: RelmapParser
    terms xs = [("term", xs)]

    rels :: RelmapParser
    rels xs = [("relmap", xs)]

    src :: RelmapParser
    src (s:xs) = [("sign", [s]), ("term", xs)]
    src _      = []



-- ----------------------  Constructors

-- | Rename term names
relmapRename :: HalfRelmap ->  [(String, String)] -> (Relmap v)
relmapRename h np = Kit.calc h "rename" (renameNP np) []

-- | Retrieve relation from dataset
relmapSource :: HalfRelmap -> String -> [String] -> (Relmap v)
relmapSource = RelmapSource



-- ----------------------  Utility

-- | Abortable 'head'
relmapHead :: [a] -> AbortOr a
relmapHead (x:_) = Right x
relmapHead _ = Left $ AbortLookup "head"

-- | Extract relsign from operand set
relmapSign :: [Named [Syn.TokenTree]] -> AbortOr String
relmapSign opd = do
  sign <- opd <!!> "sign"
  case sign of
    [Syn.Bloom (Syn.Word _ s)] -> Right s
    _ -> Left $ AbortLookup "sign"
